Text: RE A Very Merry PopsI dont remember the magic show Original Message From Hadix Susan mailtoSusan lPasocom Sent Thursday October PM To Dana Richardson Email Jake Hadix Email Jennifer Lamprecht Email Pam Macaul Email Patrick Rockecharlie Email Tori Kuykendall Email Richardson Kyle Subject A Very Merry Pops Would anyone be interested in going When Saturday December at pm Where San AntonioMajestic Theatre downtown Program A Very Merry Pops Be a part of a great San Antonio tradition our holiday program filled with music singing dancing and merrymaking featuring the Symphony Mastersingers and Childrens Chorus of San Antonio Its a gift from the Symphony family to you Price Ticket prices are to each Unfortunately the balcony is sold out for this performance The Majestic Theatre website mjstchtm San Antonio Symphony website homeasp Check out The Majestic Theatre website Jake and I have been before and its truly magical Let me know and we can begin making plans Thanks Susan A Hadix Senior Volume Analyst Tennessee Gas Pipeline Co phone pager fax after hours This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender
